universal: In Lunary, every meaning is interpreted through your full birth chart rather than in isolation.
How this shows up for you depends on your unique placements, timing, and current transits.
No symbol has a fixed meaning without chart context, which is why Lunary starts with your full birth chart.
Your birth chart is the framework, and signing in lets Lunary connect every symbol back to you.
planets: A planet’s influence changes depending on the house it occupies and the aspects it forms in your birth chart.
In Lunary, planetary meanings are interpreted through your full chart, not as standalone traits.
This planet expresses differently for each person based on their overall chart structure.
houses: The meaning of a house depends on the planets, signs, and timing activating it in your chart.
In Lunary, houses are read as living areas of life shaped by your unique birth chart.
This house carries different weight depending on how your chart is configured.
aspects: Aspects only gain meaning in relation to the rest of your birth chart.
In Lunary, aspects are interpreted as part of an interconnected chart pattern.
The same aspect can feel supportive or challenging depending on your full chart context.
transits: Transits are meaningful only in relation to your natal chart.
In Lunary, transits are read as activations in your chart, so you can see what’s actually being touched for you.
The impact of a transit depends on what it touches in your birth chart.
horoscopes: Lunary horoscopes are grounded in real planetary movement and personalised through chart context.
Rather than relying on sun signs alone, interpretations connect back to your full birth chart.
Timing matters, but how it affects you depends on your chart.
tarot: Tarot messages shift depending on timing, intention, and personal context.
In Lunary, tarot sits alongside your chart so the message lands in context, not as a generic meaning.
This card may speak differently depending on where you are in your personal cycle.
moon: Moon phases affect each person differently depending on their natal moon and chart placements.
In Lunary, lunar phases are interpreted through your birth chart and current transits.
The same phase can feel grounding or activating depending on your chart.
numerology: Numbers reveal deeper meaning when interpreted alongside personal cycles and your birth chart.
In Lunary, numerology is read as part of a broader timing system rather than in isolation.
This number reflects a pattern interacting with your chart and current phase.
clockNumbers: Repeated times act as signals, but their meaning depends on personal context.
In Lunary, clock-based numerology is interpreted through timing and chart awareness.
Seeing a time is the prompt. Your birth chart shapes the message.
angelNumbers: Angel numbers are symbolic patterns that gain meaning through repetition and awareness.
In Lunary, angel numbers are interpreted within the context of your birth chart and current cycle.
Rather than fixed messages, angel numbers reflect patterns unfolding in your life.
crystals: Crystals land differently depending on what your chart is activating, which is why Lunary ties recommendations to your timing.
In Lunary, crystal correspondences are contextual rather than prescriptive.
What supports one person may ground another based on chart balance.
spells: Rituals are most effective when aligned with timing and personal cycles.
In Lunary, spells are connected to lunar phases and chart awareness.
Intention becomes clearer when chosen in alignment with your current phase.
practices: Practices work best when they align with your natural rhythm and timing.
Lunary helps you choose approaches that fit your current cycle.
The most effective practice is the one that matches where you are now.
modernWitchcraft: Modern witchcraft is shaped by awareness, timing, and personal belief rather than rigid rules.
In Lunary, modern practice is grounded in astrology, lunar cycles, and personal context.
Meaning comes from alignment, not labels or aesthetics.
cosmicTiming: Astrology unfolds through timing and planetary motion rather than static traits.
In Lunary, meaning emerges from real-time cosmic conditions interacting with your chart.
Understanding when something happens often matters more than what happens.
personalContext: In Lunary, interpretations are shaped by your full birth chart rather than isolated placements.

symbolicSystems: Symbolic systems communicate through patterns and relationships rather than single meanings.

grimoireReference: The Grimoire is designed as a structured reference rather than a scrolling feed.

practiceWithoutDogma: Spiritual practice evolves through reflection rather than rigid belief.

integratedGuidance: Lunary integrates astrology, tarot, and ritual through a shared interpretive framework.

learningThroughCycles: Understanding unfolds through repetition and return rather than linear progress.

archetypes: Archetypes describe recurring patterns rather than fixed identities.
